description: The ambulance service says one person was treated after the blaze in Beechfield.
title: Beechfield house and cars set alight in suspected arson attack
title_page: Beechfield house and cars set alight in suspected arson attack  - BBC News
maintext:
A fire at a house which also destroyed two cars is being treated as suspected arson, police have said.
Emergency crews were called to a property in Beechfield, Newton Aycliffe, at about 22:50 GMT on Monday.
The North East Ambulance Service said one patient was treated at the scene but refused to be taken into hospital.
Durham Police has urged anyone with information or CCTV footage to get in touch.
